Test Case Description: Test the format of input string. Test if the string is empty and only numerics
First letter of the name is retained and capitalized
drop all other occurrences of a, e, i, o, u, y, h, w

Replace consonants with digits as follows (after the first letter)
b, f, p, v → 1
c, g, j, k, q, s, x, z → 2
d, t → 3
l → 4
m, n → 5
r → 6
If two or more letters with the same number are adjacent in the original name, only retain the first letter
If there are four or more numbers, retain only the first three with first letter

Test Case Name: Add zeros to assign three numbers
Test Case Description: If there are too few letters in the word to assign three numbers, append zeros until there are three numbers
Similar sounding words have same code
